MGA Entertainment is one of the largest and fastest growing privately held toy and entertainment companies in the world. Headquartered in Los Angeles, and with offices globally, the company creates innovative, proprietary, and licensed consumer products and entertainment properties, including toys, games, dolls, apparel, consumer electronics, home décor, stationery, sporting goods, movies, and television series. The MGA family includes award-winning brands such as L.O.L. Surprise!™, Little Tikes®, Rainbow High™, Shadow High™, Bratz®, MGA’s Miniverse™, Fluffie Stuffiez™ , Na! Na! Na! Surprise™, Micro Games of America™, Baby born® Surprise and Zapf Creation®. For more information, please visit us at  www.mgae.com  or check us out at LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram and Facebook.

Mission: Responsible for Kidult and Collectible brands social media coordination plus paid and influencer campaigns, social shopping, and administrative support.

Key Result Areas Allocation

1

Paid and Influencer Campaign Support

30%

2

Admin: Billing, Invoice Team Support

30%

3

TikTok/IG Shop

20%

4

Analytics

10%

5

Social Media Strategy

10%

Total Time Utilization 100%

Education/Experience

Position Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree, preferably in social media, marketing, or communications
  • 1+ years of intern and/or social media direct experience for a professional company

Skills/Knowledge/Ability

  • Narrative and audience driven understanding of social media content
  • Best practice knowledge of social media platforms including but not limited to TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube & YouTube Shorts, Twitter, Pinterest, and emerging platforms
  • Enthusiastic self-starter who aspires to be an expert social media manager and a master of scheduling, copywriting, and social content creation
  • Effective communication, management, decision-making, and relationship-building skills
  • Team player willing to absorb, enhance, and execute brand direction
  • Knowledge and interest in Kidult, Collectibles, Games, and other toy brands
  • Love of popular and internet culture
  • Extreme detail orientation is critical

Key Result Areas and Activities

Paid and Influencer Campaign Support

  • Work with social, brand team and external agencies to route assets for paid social campaigns
  • Assist team to partner seamlessly with internal and external creative partners to produce high quality content for paid social campaigns
  • Work with social team and cross functional partners on influencer campaigns and events to secure, contract, and coordinate with influencers and influencer agencies

Admin

  • Billing and Invoicing
  • Contracting creators for all social campaigns
  • Asset Management

TikTok and Instagram Shop

  • Partner with the social team to execute TikTok and Instagram shop strategy
  • Work with affiliate influencers across platforms on key products
  • Partner with Social team to execute TikTok live strategy

Analytics

  • Preparation and pulling reporting from social channels and from our publishing tool
  • Closely analyze results to inform the team of noticed trends, successes, and opportunities

Social Media Strategy

  • Work with team stakeholders to support development of content/plans to grow/support the community, meet engagement metrics, and ensure best practices are followed

Pay Range

$23.00 - $25.00/ hourly
